query:
UPDATE spots
               SET name = ?,
                   description = ?,
                   qty_total = ?,
                   qty_per_person = ?,
                   kind = ?,
                   sort = ?,
                   required_contribution = ?,
                   min_contribution = ?,
                   max_contribution = ?,
                   suggested_contribution = ?,
                   required_notice_hours = ?,
                   updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
               WHERE id = ?
